SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CustomInfoContributor
The CustomInfoContributor class is a Spring component that dynamically enriches the information exposed by the /actuator/info endpoint.
GlobalHandlerException
This class centralizes the handling of exceptions across the application, providing consistent error responses for validation errors and custom exceptions.
LoggingFilter
This filter logs incoming HTTP requests to provide visibility into API activity, including authentication headers, user roles, and request details.
MpatientApplication
Entry point of the Microservice Patient application.
Patient
Entity class representing a patient in the *mPatient* microservice of the *MicroDiab* project.
PatientController
REST Controller for managing patient-related operations.
PatientDuplicateException
Custom exception thrown when an attempt is made to create a duplicate patient record.
PatientNotFoundException
Custom exception thrown when a requested patient record is not found.
PatientRepository
Repository interface for managing Patient entities in the *mPatient* microservice of the *MicroDiab* project.
PatientService
Service class responsible for managing Patient entities.
RequestLoggingFilter
Custom request logging filter for the *mpatient* microservice in the *MicroDiab* project.
SecurityConfig
Configuration class for security settings in the mPatient microservice.
TracingHelper
Helper class for managing tracing spans and tags in a Spring Boot application.
WebConfig
Configuration class for customizing Spring MVC web configuration.
